message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this division reflects the urgency for you to secure a good portion before inflation diminishes its value further.
Alice, I understand the time pressure, but your initial offer significantly undervalues my position. Let's be practical. This offer reflects a fairer split.
Bob, your counter-offer was tempting, but the value diminishes rapidly for both of us. This is a compromise that accounts for the time-sensitive nature of our situation.
